ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What! Do you dispute with him about what he saw?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Will you dispute with him what he saw?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Are you, then, going to contend with him regarding what he sees with his eyes?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Will you then argue with him about what he saw?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: What! So do you dispute with him regarding what he saw?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Will you then dispute with him about what he saw
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What! do you then dispute with him as to what he saw?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: what, will you dispute with him what he sees?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Will ye then dispute with him concerning what he seeth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Will you then dispute with him as to what he saw?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Will ye therefore dispute with him concerning that which he hath Seen?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Will you then dispute with him about what he saw?!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Will ye then dispute with him concerning what he saw?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Will you then dispute with him (Muhammad SAW) about what he saw [during the Mi'raj: (Ascent of the Prophet SAW over the seven heavens)].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What, will you dispute with him about what he sees!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Will you dispute with him concerning what he saw?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So will you dispute with him over what he saw?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:12] Will you then dispute with him, will you [then] argue with him and [hope to] overwhelm him, concerning what he saw? — an address to the idolaters who denied the Prophet’s (s) vision of Gabriel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 621 When the Prophet (pbuh) informed them of what he saw, they disbelieved him. And so Allah said: (Will ye then dispute with him concerning) will you then disbelieve (what he seeth) what Muhammad (pbuh) saw?
